headline: Cacique Foods appoints former Mondelez executive as new CEO
summary: Pedro Silveira succeeds Gil de Cardenas, who led the company since 2009 and is moving to non-executive chair.

raw.headline: Cacique Foods appoints former Mondelez executive as new CEO
raw.summary: Pedro Silveira succeeds Gil de Cardenas, who led the company since 2009 and is moving to non-executive chair.

headline: 5 Must-Read Analyst Questions From Mondelez’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Mondelez’s first quarter results prompted a positive response from the market, as the company’s profit surpassed analyst expectations despite flat sales. Management attributed this performance to strong pricing execution in the chocolate segment, successful product launches, and disciplined cost management. CEO Dirk Van de Put highlighted that effective price increases, particularly in Europe, and continued brand loyalty for core products like Oreo and Cadbury Dairy Milk offset the volume pressu
